page.title: 08Living at the Crematorium.
page.content: My name is Libby Thompson and I live at the Mid Warwickshire Crematorium as my father is the manager. I enjoy living there as I get to see lots of wild life and its very peaceful. However because of the regulations regarding crematoriums we do live in a very isolated spot. As I attend school in Bishop's Tachbrook this is where most of my friends live. It's too far to walk so we travel to each others houses by car,although we do talk a lot on the telephone. Both my parents work so we do our shopping in Leamington on a Saturday. We are on Mains electricity but our cooker is on propane gas and a tanker collects our sewage. Many of my friends think a crematorium is a creepy place to live, but I do not agree.
